mapper.select: SELECT PF.* , PC.PHO_IMG AS LAST_PHOTO FROM PHOTO_FOLDER PF LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT FOLDER_NUM , PHO_IMG FROM PHOTO_CATEGORY WHERE PHO_NO IN ( SELECT MAX( PHO_NO ) FROM PHOTO_CATEGORY PC GROUP BY PC.FOLDER_NUM ) ) PC ON PF.FOLDER_NUM = PC.FOLDER_NUM WHERE COUPLE_NUM = #{couple_num}
mapper.update: SELECT PF.* , PC.PHO_IMG AS LAST_PHOTO FROM PHOTO_FOLDER PF LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT FOLDER_NUM , PHO_IMG FROM PHOTO_CATEGORY WHERE PHO_NO IN ( SELECT MAX( PHO_NO ) FROM PHOTO_CATEGORY PC GROUP BY PC.FOLDER_NUM ) ) PC ON PF.FOLDER_NUM = PC.FOLDER_NUM WHERE COUPLE_NUM = {#couple_num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO photo_folder (id, couple_num, folder_name) VALUES (#{id}, #{couple_num}, #{folder_name} )
INSERT INTO photo_category (pho_img, pho_date, folder_num) values(#{pho_img}, sysdate, #{folder_num})
insert into photo_category (pho_img, folder_num) select #{pho_img}, pf.folder_num from photo_folder pf where pf.folder_num = #{folder_num}
